title: Art of Principled Negotiation (for junior researchers)
description: A powerpoint presentation that may be used to organize workshops in which participants may practice with Principled Negotiation in their academic environment. One role play is elaborated and deals with honorary authorship, a questionable research practice that is very prevalent.

main.name: Getting to yes-facts and role play CAPITA SELECTA EBM MASTERS workshop 8 June 2022.pptx

workspace.bio:
Senior scientific adviser at the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences (Urban Vitality Centre of Expertise) and associate professor of epidemiology at the Amsterdam University Medical Center (Dept. Cardiology). Dr. ter Riet is specialized in research on research integrity and served on the committee that drafted the Research Program ‘Fostering Responsible Research Practices’ for ZonMw in 2015.
